title: GENERAL
fullText:
Disconnection devices shall be marked with an identification name or number according to the BESS wiring diagram and consistent with the shutdown procedure. The minimum size of this sign shall be such that it can be read from a distance of 1 m.
All switches shall clearly and reliably indicate the isolating position of the device. The symbols "0" (off) and "I" (on) are deemed to satisfy this requirement.
